title: godoc: No way to go get to package tracker
body:
>> I have a proposal to add partial Windows support to
>> https://godoc.org/golang.org/x/crypto/ssh/terminal but I can't see any links
>> to issue tracker or feedback form. Why?

> It does seem difficult to get from the golang.org page to the actual
> repository.  Please open an issue about that at
> https://golang.org/issue .  Thanks.
